ExportResources.name: Genetic Code Template
ExportResources.description: Copies the dominant genes of a pet onto the template. This can then be used to increase the chances that traits from the original pet will carry across to a newborn clone.

ExportResources.description: This device facilitates the growth of a Kubrow or Kavat clone, from birth to adolescence.

ExportResources.name: Nai-Zhen Kubrow Collar
ExportResources.description: Records the genetic memory and DNA sequence of a Kubrow, allowing it to be reconstructed in the Incubator.

ExportResources.name: DNA Stabilizers
ExportResources.description: Contains 6 DNA Stabilizers to maintain the health of a Kubrow or Kavat.

ExportResources.name: "Circle of Comrades" Series on VHS
ExportResources.description: The critically acclaimed 'Circle of Comrades' complete series on VHS. 6-Tape Boxed Set.

ExportResources.name: Efervon Sample
ExportResources.description: A sample of the corrosive substance that Scaldra use to purge Techrot. Handle with care.Location: 1999 (Höllvania)

ExportResources.name: Höllvanian Pitchweave Fragment
ExportResources.description: An Efervon-resistant material used to craft Scaldra uniforms.Location: 1999 (Höllvania)

ExportResources.name: Techrot Motherboard
ExportResources.description: This motherboard likely served as a nerve center, facilitating the Techrot’s communication network.Location: 1999 (Höllvania)

ExportResources.name: Techrot Chitin
ExportResources.description: This twisted husk barely resembles the electronic device it once was, consumed and reshaped by the Techrot’s relentless spread.Location: 1999 (Höllvania)

ExportResources.name: Experimental Arc-Relay
ExportResources.description: Höllvanian ingenuity knows no bounds, and this unregulated marvel is proof! A cutting-edge device brimming with untamed innovation.Location: 1999 (Höllvania)

ExportResources.name: The Countessa Comic
ExportResources.description: The Countessa isn’t just an icon—she’s a hero! Issues from this cult classic comic series are sought after by subculture enthusiasts who know the value of a strong and stylish protagonist. Trade this Hex Treasure with Lettie to earn standing with The Hex.Location: 1999 (Höllvania)

ExportResources.name: On-lyne CD
ExportResources.description: The ultimate gift for fans of On-lyne! Show your love and support with this must-have merch for any music lover’s collection. Trade this Hex Treasure with Lettie to earn standing with The Hex.Location: 1999 (Höllvania)

ExportResources.name: Chuggin' Along Sixpack
ExportResources.description: A set of liquid comfort perfect for anyone who deserves a moment to unwind. Ideal for someone carrying the weight of the world on their shoulders. Trade this Hex Treasure with Lettie to earn standing with The Hex.Location: 1999 (Höllvania)

ExportResources.name: Mood Crystal
ExportResources.description: Sleek, stylish, and soothing, mood crystals are the perfect gift for anyone in need of a little calm. Trade this Hex Treasure with Lettie to earn standing with The Hex.Location: 1999 (Höllvania)

ExportResources.name: Cheddar Crowns Cereal
ExportResources.description: A nostalgic treat for the ultimate ‘90s kid! Remember those commercials with the cheerful mouse quartet? Trade this Hex Treasure with Lettie to earn standing with The Hex.Location: 1999 (Höllvania)

ExportResources.name: 35mm Film
ExportResources.description: For the documentarian who sees the world through a unique lens, extra film is always a win. Trade this Hex Treasure with Lettie to earn standing with The Hex.Location: 1999 (Höllvania)

ExportResources.name: Big Bytes Pizza
ExportResources.description: Who doesn't like pizza? Trade this Hex Treasure with Lettie to earn standing with The Hex.Location: 1999 (Höllvania)

ExportResources.name: Argon Burger Meal
ExportResources.description: Burgers so tasty they always disappear!Location: 1999 (Höllvania)

ExportResources.name: Inaak
ExportResources.description: Some theorize that Duviri stands upon the shell of a giant Inaak. Naturally, some wonder what the giant Inaak stands upon. The answer, of course, is other Inaaks, all the way down.

ExportResources.name: Xiran
ExportResources.description: The Golden Maw finds Xirans exceptionally delicious.

ExportResources.name: Haav
ExportResources.description: Haav prefer to swim near the surface. Duviri citizens often mistake them for logs, which can be startling when Haav show their fangs.

ExportResources.name: Namaes
ExportResources.description: The Namaes has evolved the ability to tense its tail muscles and use its tail as a fearsome weapon.

ExportResources.name: Seonn
ExportResources.description: The Seonn’s ability to flare its neck and hood makes it impossible for most predators to swallow, but the Golden Maw can overcome its defense.

ExportResources.name: Nacreous Pebble
ExportResources.description: Collectors like to marvel at the peculiar origin of Nacreous Pebbles. Their beauty is the result of ordinary pebbles having been ingested and regurgitated by the Golden Maw.Location: Maw Feeding in The Duviri Experience

ExportResources.name: Ariette Scale
ExportResources.description: Each Duviri fish species has distinct features, but they all evolved beautiful chromatic scales.Location: Maw Feeding in The Duviri Experience

ExportResources.name: Maw Fang
ExportResources.description: Looks like someone got carried away during a delicious meal.Location: Maw Feeding in The Duviri Experience

ExportResources.name: Pathos Clamp
ExportResources.description: The manifestation of Thrax's malevolence that shapes the Orowyrms' outbursts.Location: Rewarded upon defeating the Orowyrm in Duviri

ExportResources.name: Tertium
ExportResources.description: Its power lies in its potential.Location: Duviri

ExportResources.name: Lamentus
ExportResources.description: A whisper of the fallen.Location: Duviri

ExportResources.name: Rune Marrow
ExportResources.description: Rune Marrow erupts from Duviri’s core.Location: The Undercroft in Duviri

ExportResources.name: Kullervo's Bane
ExportResources.description: Kullervo's fury incarnate. Acrithis will trade this prized artifact for certain items from her collection.Location: Earned by confronting Kullervo and defeating the Orowyrm in the same Duviri mission during the Fear, Anger, or Sorrow spiral

ExportResources.name: Tasoma Extract
ExportResources.description: Duviri citizens plagued by nightmares seek Tasoma, because its stalks can be crushed to create juice that invites pleasant dreams. Unfortunately, it is difficult to forage Tasoma as it only grows in caves.Location: Duviri

ExportResources.name: Tasoma Spore
ExportResources.description: A Tasoma fungal spore, suitable for growing in the Dormizone’s garden.

ExportResources.name: Kovnik
ExportResources.description: Duviri citizens harvest Kovnik leaves to blend invigorating teas.Location: Duviri

ExportResources.name: Eevani
ExportResources.description: Duviri citizens have been known to mash Eevani leaves into a paste that alleviates the discomfort caused by fresh wounds.Location: Duviri

ExportResources.name: Connla Sprout
ExportResources.description: The water that courses through Connla Sprouts tastes sweet and refreshing.Location: Duviri

ExportResources.name: Yao Shrub
ExportResources.description: The warm light of the Yao Shrub glows even within cold dark places.Location: Duviri

ExportResources.name: Silphsela
ExportResources.description: It is traditionally held that to see Silphsela floating in the air heralds an imminent change in the sky.Location: Duviri

ExportResources.name: Dracroot
ExportResources.description: Dracroot is a staple of the Wyrmling’s diet.Location: Duviri

ExportResources.name: Ueymag
ExportResources.description: Ueymag meat is said to be delicious. Just mind the barbs.Location: Duviri

ExportResources.name: Saggen Pearl
ExportResources.description: Thrax warriors use the heavy liquid drawn from Saggen Wells to polish their weapons.Location: Duviri

ExportResources.name: Enigma Gyrum
ExportResources.description: A token celebrating the successful solution of a Duviri Enigma.Location: Earned by completing Enigmas in The Duviri Experience

ExportResources.name: Aggristone
ExportResources.description: It is said that Aggri Formations are hardened saliva from mighty Orowyrms. Duviri citizens believe Aggristones are powerful talismans.Location: Duviri

ExportResources.name: Hemocyte Cystolith
ExportResources.description: Torn from the bile duct of a fallen Hemocyte.Location: Hemocytes found in Plague Star event Bounties in the Plains of Eidolon on Earth

ExportResources.name: Brilliant Eidolon Shard
ExportResources.description: Rare shard gained from capturing the Sentients roaming the Plains of Eidolon on Earth at night. Use it to gain Focus or to unbind Way-bound focus nodes.
ExportResources.longDescription: One of the rarest, most valuable Eidolon shards. Flawless.

ExportResources.name: Radiant Eidolon Shard
ExportResources.description: Rare shard gained from capturing the Sentients roaming the Plains of Eidolon on Earth at night. Use it to gain Focus.
ExportResources.longDescription: A shard of unmatched beauty and power.

ExportResources.name: Eidolon Shard
ExportResources.description: Shard gained from the Sentients roaming the Plains of Eidolon on Earth at night.
ExportResources.longDescription: The most prized part of an Eidolon. Jewelry created from an Eidolon shard is most prized in Cetus.

ExportResources.name: Synthetic Eidolon Shard
ExportResources.longDescription: An Eidolon Shard synthesized from Sanctuary study.

ExportResources.name: Condroc Wing
ExportResources.description: The talon on a condroc's wing is sharp enough to tear through bone.Location: Plains of Eidolon on Earth

ExportResources.name: Cetus Wisp
ExportResources.description: Most common at night, these stone lifeforms are drawn to shorelines touched by the Eidolon. They linger around lakes on the Plains of Eidolon at all hours. Their origin remains mysterious.Location: Plains of Eidolon on Earth

ExportResources.name: Maprico
ExportResources.description: This hardy fruit is thick-skinned to withstand harsh conditions, concealing a mouthful of sweet pulp within.Location: Plains of Eidolon on Earth

ExportResources.name: Kuaka Spinal Claw
ExportResources.description: The sinew from the Kuaka's spinal claws can be tanned to make resilient and flexible leather.Location: Plains of Eidolon on Earth

ExportResources.name: Grokdrul
ExportResources.description: A noxious mix of polysaccharides and long-chain polymers, Grokdrul is a standard chemical used in Grineer manufacturing.Location: Plains of Eidolon on Earth

ExportResources.name: Iradite
ExportResources.description: A mineral valuable to the Ostrons.Location: Plains of Eidolon on Earth

ExportResources.name: Nistlepod
ExportResources.description: Used by the Nistlebrush to trap and kill prey.Location: Plains of Eidolon on Earth

ExportResources.name: Intact Sentient Core
ExportResources.description: An integral component of Sentient anatomy.  Rarely found undamaged, the specimen may prove useful.Location: Drops from Vomvalysts on the Plains of Eidolon (Earth) at night, and from Sentients found on Lua and the Veil Proxima

ExportResources.name: Flawless Sentient Core
ExportResources.description: A Sentient Core of this quality and condition has rarely been found. Truly a special specimen.Location: Earned by capturing Eidolons found roaming the Plains of Eidolon on Earth at night

ExportResources.name: Exceptional Sentient Core
ExportResources.description: A coveted sample of Sentient internal anatomy. Specimens of this age and quality are both rare and valuable. Location: Eidolons found roaming the Plains of Eidolon on Earth at night

ExportResources.name: Riven Transmuter
ExportResources.description: Combine multiple Rivens to create a new, different Riven.

ExportResources.name: Jahu Gargoyle
ExportResources.description: A curious blueprint found in the memory banks of Albrecht Entrati's Pom-2.

ExportResources.name: Curse of Knowing
ExportResources.description: This curse contains knowledge that will help Fibonacci prevent enemies from breaking free of The Sanctum. Feed curses to the Jahu Gargoyle in your Clan Dojo to re-calibrate its defensive capabilities.Location: Effervo (Deimos) during Operation Gargoyle's Cry

ExportResources.name: Curse of Hearing
ExportResources.description: This curse contains knowledge that will help Fibonacci prevent enemies from breaking free of The Sanctum. Feed curses to the Jahu Gargoyle in your Clan Dojo to re-calibrate its defensive capabilities.Location: Effervo (Deimos) during Operation Gargoyle's Cry

ExportResources.name: Curse of Seeing
ExportResources.description: This curse contains knowledge that will help Fibonacci prevent enemies from breaking free of The Sanctum. Feed curses to the Jahu Gargoyle in your Clan Dojo to re-calibrate its defensive capabilities.Location: Effervo (Deimos) during Operation Gargoyle's Cry

ExportResources.name: Grotesque Splinter
ExportResources.description: A foreboding fragment of the vast Indifference.Location: Effervo (Deimos) during Operation Gargoyle's Cry

ExportResources.name: Shrill Voca
ExportResources.description: A Voidtongue cry, trapped in the stone. Crucial to unraveling the secrets of the Murmur.Location: Albrecht's Laboratories (Deimos)

ExportResources.name: Echo Voca
ExportResources.description: The quietest and most elusive of Voidtongue utterances. Sought after but never found by Albrecht.Location: Albrecht's Laboratories (Deimos)

ExportResources.name: Bellow Voca
ExportResources.description: The deepest of Voidtongue moans, etched into stone. An unlikely asset in the construction of Albrecht's vessels.Location: Albrecht's Laboratories (Deimos)

ExportResources.name: Entrati Obols
ExportResources.description: During the Orokin era, these obols were a commonly recognized mark of the Entrati family. Some Archimedeans even used them as good luck talismans.Location: Albrecht's Laboratories (Deimos)

ExportResources.name: Necracoil
ExportResources.description: This experimental array transmutes Void energy into high voltages with low currents.Location: Albrecht's Laboratories (Deimos)

ExportResources.name: Entrati Lanthorn
ExportResources.description: A ceremonial beacon used to map Void locations on to real space.Location: Albrecht's Laboratories (Deimos) and Zariman

ExportResources.name: Stela
ExportResources.description: This Void-touched stone contains an ominous essence.Location: Albrecht's Laboratories (Deimos)

ExportResources.name: Vessel Capillaries
ExportResources.description: A crucial sub-component in the construction of Albrecht Entrati’s vessels.Obtained from Disruption missions on Armatus, Deimos.

ExportResources.name: Damaged Necramech Casing
ExportResources.description: The damaged remains of a Necramech supporting frame.Location: Enemy Necramechs found in Isolation Vault Bounties on the Cambion Drift, and purchased from Loid in the Necralisk (Deimos) after completing The War Within quest

ExportResources.name: Damaged Necramech Engine
ExportResources.description: An engine designed for use in a Necramech. Unfortunately, it’s damaged.Location: Enemy Necramechs found in Isolation Vault Bounties on the Cambion Drift (Deimos), and purchased from Loid in the Necralisk (Deimos) after completing The War Within quest

ExportResources.name: Damaged Necramech Pod
ExportResources.description: A modular component for a Necramech. It’s damaged and in need of repair.Location: Enemy Necramechs found in Isolation Vault Bounties on the Cambion Drift (Deimos), and purchased from Loid in the Necralisk (Deimos) after completing The War Within quest

ExportResources.name: Damaged Necramech Weapon Pod
ExportResources.description: A broken weapon system intended for a Necramech.Location: Enemy Necramechs found in Isolation Vault Bounties on the Cambion Drift (Deimos), and purchased from Loid in the Necralisk (Deimos) after completing The War Within quest

ExportResources.name: Damaged Necramech Weapon Barrel
ExportResources.description: The damaged barrel of a heavy-duty Necramech weapon.Location: Isolation Vault and Arcana Isolation Vault Bounties on the Cambion Drift (Deimos), and purchased from Loid in the Necralisk (Deimos) after completing The War Within quest

ExportResources.name: Damaged Necramech Weapon Receiver

Highly coveted by Parvos Granum for his Jade Eximus program.Obtained from Operation Ascension missions (Brutus on Uranus) and special Operation Alerts during Operation: Belly of the Beast.

ExportResources.name: Vestigial Motes

ExportResources.name: Crisma Toroid
ExportResources.description: A device of undetermined function and origin. Prized by Vox Solaris and the Quills.Earn Crisma Toroids by defeating the Profit-Taker Orb on the Orb Vallis (Venus).

ExportResources.name: Lazulite Toroid
ExportResources.description: A device of undetermined function and origin. Prized by Vox Solaris and the Quills.Earn Lazulite Toroids by defeating the Exploiter Orb on the Orb Vallis (Venus).

ExportResources.name: Calda Toroid
ExportResources.description: A device of undetermined function and origin. Prized by Vox Solaris and the Quills.Earn Calda Toroids from enemies located at the Enrichment Labs in the Orb Vallis and from Scyto Raknoids. They can also be found as pick-ups in caves located around the Orb Vallis (Venus).

ExportResources.name: Vega Toroid
ExportResources.description: A device of undetermined function and origin. Prized by Vox Solaris and the Quills.Earn Vega Toroids from enemies located at the Spaceport in the Orb Vallis and from Mite Raknoids. They can also be found as pick-ups in caves located around the Orb Vallis (Venus).

ExportResources.name: Sola Toroid
ExportResources.description: A device of undetermined function and origin. Prized by Vox Solaris and the Quills.Earn Sola Toroids from enemies located at the Temple of Profit in the Orb Vallis and from Kyta Raknoids. They can also be found as pick-ups in caves located around the Orb Vallis (Venus).

ExportResources.name: Thermal Sludge
ExportResources.description: A by-product from the Weeping Towers terraforming processes.Location: Orb Vallis on Venus

ExportResources.name: Gyromag Systems
ExportResources.description: A modular component that regulates latitude and altitude in various Corpus systems. Location: Obtained by completing Heists on the Orb Vallis (Venus)

ExportResources.name: Atmo Systems
ExportResources.description: A modular component that compensates for the multitude of atmospheric conditions encountered in the Origin System. Location: Obtained by completing Heists on the Orb Vallis (Venus)

ExportResources.name: Repeller Systems
ExportResources.description: Anti-gravity system that allows massively heavy objects to be manipulated by a single user. Location: Obtained by completing Heists on the Orb Vallis (Venus)

ExportResources.name: Mytocardia Spore
ExportResources.description: A fungal body prized for its varied uses.Location: Orb Vallis on Venus

ExportResources.name: Orokin Monitor
ExportResources.description: These Orokin devices emerge when the floating glaciers impact on the surface of Venus. Their purpose is unknown.

ExportResources.name: Gorgaricus Spore
ExportResources.description: The reproductive spore of the giant Vallis fungi is highly coveted for the complex chemical compounds it contains.Location: Orb Vallis on Venus

ExportResources.name: Frostcap
ExportResources.description: Engineered by the Orokin to convert airborne chemicals into breathable air.

ExportResources.name: Tepa Nodule
ExportResources.description: The iridescent nodules on these plants glow brightly in cold environments.Location: Orb Vallis on Venus

ExportResources.name: Lua Thrax Plasm
ExportResources.description: A unique variant of Thrax Plasm harvested during Void Conjunctions on Lua.Location: Yuvarium and Circulus on Lua

ExportResources.name: Voidplume Pinion
ExportResources.description: A Void Angel's living feather, ripped out in combat.Location: Zariman
ExportResources.longDescription: The most prized part of an Eidolon. Jewelry created from an Eidolon shard is most prized in Cetus.

ExportResources.name: Thrax Plasm
ExportResources.description: Found in the remnants of Thrax Void manifestations, this plasm has several surprisingly practical applications.Location: Zariman

ExportResources.name: Voidplume Quill
ExportResources.description: A symbol of genius, fallen from Void Angels long ago.Location: Zariman

ExportResources.name: Voidplume Down
ExportResources.description: Barbed and half-real, shed by a Void Angel.Location: Zariman

ExportResources.name: Voidplume Crest
ExportResources.description: The fine plumes from a Void Angel's crown.Location: Zariman

ExportResources.name: Voidplume Vane
ExportResources.description: A metallic plume from a Void Angel's wing.Location: Zariman

ExportResources.name: Voidgel Orb
ExportResources.description: A sample of ambient Void energy distilled into a neutral state.Location: Zariman

ExportResources.name: Entrati Lanthorn
ExportResources.description: A ceremonial beacon used to map Void locations on to real space.Location: Albrecht's Laboratories (Deimos) and Zariman
ExportResources.longDescription: The most prized part of an Eidolon. Jewelry created from an Eidolon shard is most prized in Cetus.

ExportResources.description: Simulate a battle in a Techrot-choked Mall beneath Höllvania. This simulacrum allows enemy difficulty to be set 25 levels above the standard maximum.

ExportResources.name: Höllvanian Courtyard Simulacrum
ExportResources.description: Simulate a battle in the back-alleys of Höllvania. This simulacrum allows enemy difficulty to be set 25 levels above the standard maximum.

ExportResources.description: Stage a battle in your enemy's arena for deeper insight into their tactics. This simulacrum allows enemy difficulty to be set 25 levels above the standard maximum.

ExportResources.name: Grineer Asteroid Simulacrum
ExportResources.description: Step into your opponent's territory to devise a strategy for their defeat. This simulacrum allows enemy difficulty to be set 25 levels above the standard maximum.

ExportResources.name: Orokin Derelict Simulacrum
ExportResources.description: Simulate a battle inside an Orokin Derelict. This simulacrum allows enemy difficulty to be set 25 levels above the standard maximum.

ExportResources.name: Ambulas Arena Simulacrum
ExportResources.description: Simulate a battle on your foe's terrain. This simulacrum allows enemy difficulty to be set 25 levels above the standard maximum.

ExportResources.name: Red Veil Temple Simulacrum
ExportResources.description: Hone your combat skills under the auspices of the Red Veil. This simulacrum allows enemy difficulty to be set 25 levels above the standard maximum.

ExportResources.name: Moonlit Courtyard Simulacrum
ExportResources.description: Simulate a battle under the light of Lua. This simulacrum allows enemy difficulty to be set 25 levels above the standard maximum.

ExportResources.name: Infested Catalyst
ExportResources.description: This refined toxin catalyst has been formulated to reinforce the Thrax Toxin and maximize damage to the Infested boil in Plague Star bounties.Location: Bio Lab in Clan Dojo

ExportResources.name: Eidolon Phylaxis
ExportResources.description: Sentient immunity to the Infestation is exploited with this refined phylaxis. Formulated specifically to combat Infested boils in Plague Star bounties.Location: Nakak's Operational Supply in Cetus

ExportResources.name: Animo Nav Beacon
ExportResources.description: Used to locate the Ambulas production facility.This resource is dropped from Ambulas Units.

ExportResources.name: Scarlet Credits
ExportResources.description: Battle pay for Tenno fighting in Operation Scarlet Spear.

ExportResources.name: Ferment Bladder
ExportResources.description: Many Deimos fish secrete reagents in a pouchlike organ, creating volatile gases that enable limited periods of levitation. Source: Cut from the following Cambion Drift fish via Daughter in the Necralisk (Deimos):OstimyrAquapulmoVitreospinaCryptosuctusBarbisteoKymaerosAmniophysiGlutinox

ExportResources.name: Tubercular Gill System
ExportResources.description: Adaptive membranes allow many Deimos fish to move freely between fluid and gaseous environments.Source: Cut from the following Cambion Drift fish via Daughter in the Necralisk (Deimos):OstimyrAquapulmoVitreospinaMyxostomataDuroid

ExportResources.name: Benign Infested Tumor
ExportResources.description: The Infestation infects all fish on Deimos, even those that do not show any external mutations.Source: Cut from all Cambion Drift fish via Daughter in the Necralisk (Deimos).

ExportResources.name: Pustulent Cognitive Nodule
ExportResources.description: The Infestation provokes the growth of multiple, seemingly redundant brain-like clusters, whose function may be linked to hivemind activity. Source: Cut from Aquapulmo and Cryptosuctus fish via Daughter in the Necralisk (Deimos). Catch Aquapulmo in Cambion Drift surface hotspots during Vome, and Cryptosuctus on the Cambion Drift surface during Fass. Also drops from Requiem Obelisks and Rolizor Infested Cysts in the Cambion Drift.

ExportResources.name: Dendrite Blastoma
ExportResources.description: Elements of other lifeforms are detectable in Infested body parts, such as this apparently parasitic clump of land-dwelling animal tissue.Source: Cut from Vitreospina and Barbisteo fish via Daughter in the Necralisk (Deimos). Catch both Vitreospina and Barbisteo in Cambion Drift caves during Vome and Fass. Also drops from Spitia Infested Cysts in the Cambion Drift.

ExportResources.name: Saturated Muscle Mass
ExportResources.description: Environmental contamination is co-responsible for mutations, alongside Infested cellular alteration.Source: Cut from Ostimyr and Kymaeros fish via Daughter in the Necralisk (Deimos). Catch Ostimyr in Cambion Drift surface hotspots during Fass, and Kymaeros on the Cambion Drift surface during Fass and Vome. Also drops from Infested Cysts in the Cambion Drift.

ExportResources.name: Waxen Sebum Deposit
ExportResources.description: Remnants of creatures' original bodily fluids persist post-Infestation, often crystalized or congealed into entirely new compounds.Source: Cut from Amniophysi fish via Daughter in the Necralisk (Deimos). Catch Amniophysi in Cambion Drift caves during Vome and Fass.

ExportResources.name: Sporulate Sac
ExportResources.description: These pressurized repositories of Infested spores require careful extraction or explosive rupture and local contamination may occur.Source: Cut from Glutinox fish via Daughter in the Necralisk (Deimos). Catch Glutinox on the Cambion Drift surface during Vome.  Also drops from Requiem Obelisks and Infested Cysts in the Cambion Drift.

ExportResources.name: Ocular Stem-Root
ExportResources.description: The organs that once served as eyes, prior to Infestation, are still replete with useful components.Source: Cut from Flagellocanth fish via Daughter in the Necralisk (Deimos). Catch Flagellocanth in Cambion Drift surface hotspots using Processed Fass Residue during Fass and Vome. Also drops from Isolation Vault Bounties in the Cambion Drift.

ExportResources.name: Parasitic Tethermaw
ExportResources.description: Used to latch on to other life forms for feeding purposes, and to inject them with anticoagulants and sporelets.Source: Cut from Lobotriscid fish via Daughter in the Necralisk (Deimos). Catch Lobotriscid on the Cambion Drift surface during Vome.  Also drops from Isolation Vault Bounties in the Cambion Drift.

ExportResources.name: Biotic Filter
ExportResources.description: Sifting the glutinous Exocrine is an essential part of the survival process, and a reminder of the creature's original function.Source: Cut from Aquapulmo and Duroid fish via Daughter in the Necralisk (Deimos). Catch Aquapulmo in Cambion Drift surface hotspots during Vome, and Duroid in Cambion Drift cave hotspots during Fass and Vome. Also drops from Requiem Obelisks and Auroron Entrati Caskets in the Cambion Drift.

ExportResources.name: Spinal Core Section
ExportResources.description: Many delicate and complex nerve fibers are housed in the jointed vertebrae, which are one of the creature's most resilient parts. Found from Vitreospina fish known to eke out a primitive existence in cave systems.Source: Cut from Vitreospina and Chondricord fish via Daughter in the Necralisk (Deimos). Catch Vitreospina in Cambion Drift caves during Fass and Vome, and Chondricord in Cambion Drift cave hotspots during Fass and Vome. Also drops from Isolation Vault Bounties and Sagiant Entrati Caskets in the Cambion Drift.

ExportResources.name: Cranial Foremount
ExportResources.description: Beneath the membranous protein layers can be found a secondary 'skull'; flexible, tough and highly conductive.Source: Cut from Myxostomata fish via Daughter in the Necralisk (Deimos). Catch Myxostomata in Cambion Drift cave hotspots using Processed Vome Residue during Vome. Also drops from Requiem Obelisks in the Cambion Drift.

ExportResources.name: Aquapulmo
ExportResources.description: These fish were purposefully contaminated with the Infestation as an Entrati 'experiment'. They feed off the organic deposits in cave systems.

ExportResources.description: Crammed with redundant, mutated internal organs, this pungent fish mingles Orokin and Infested ancestry. It is confined to the Exocrine and is only active by the light of the Wyrm Fass.

ExportResources.name: Glutinox
ExportResources.description: These hefty fish are cannibalistic. They rise by Vome's light to absorb rare gases, retreating when Fass ascends to devour their smaller kin in their lairs.

ExportResources.name: Duroid
ExportResources.description: A living fossil hearkening back to the Orokin era, this elusive fish hides below the surface of Exocrine pools in the deepest caverns it can find. Unlike Infested fish breeds, it has no ability to hover.

ExportResources.name: Chondricord
ExportResources.description: A triumph of Orokin bio-engineering, these hardy fish have adapted to the Deimos environment and seem oddly resistant to Infestation. They thrive in cave environments.

ExportResources.name: Inaak
ExportResources.description: Some theorize that Duviri stands upon the shell of a giant Inaak. Naturally, some wonder what the giant Inaak stands upon. The answer, of course, is other Inaaks, all the way down.

ExportResources.name: Xiran
ExportResources.description: The Golden Maw finds Xirans exceptionally delicious.

ExportResources.name: Haav
ExportResources.description: Haav prefer to swim near the surface. Duviri citizens often mistake them for logs, which can be startling when Haav show their fangs.

ExportResources.name: Namaes
ExportResources.description: The Namaes has evolved the ability to tense its tail muscles and use its tail as a fearsome weapon.

ExportResources.name: Seonn
ExportResources.description: The Seonn’s ability to flare its neck and hood makes it impossible for most predators to swallow, but the Golden Maw can overcome its defense.

ExportResources.name: Charc Electroplax
ExportResources.description: Harvested by the Ostron as a catalyst used in their synthetics.Source: Cut from Charc Eels via Fisher Hai-Luk in Cetus (Earth). Catch Charc Eels in the Plains of Eidolon lake at any time of day. Also drops from Thumpers in the Plains of Eidolon.

ExportResources.name: Goopolla Spleen
ExportResources.description: Used in Ostron remedies to purify toxins.Source: Cut from Goopolla fish via Fisher Hai-Luk in Cetus (Earth). Catch Goopolla in the Plains of Eidolon ocean at any time of day. Also drops from Thumpers in the Plains of Eidolon.

ExportResources.name: Murkray Liver
ExportResources.description: An ingredient used in Ostron cooking and medicine.Source: Cut from Murkray fish via Fisher Hai-Luk in Cetus (Earth). Catch Murkray in Plains of Eidolon ocean hotspots at any time of day using Murkray Bait. Also drops from Thumpers in the Plains of Eidolon.

ExportResources.name: Sharrac Teeth
ExportResources.description: These will often adorn ceremonial garb or as a reagent for synthetics.Source: Cut from Sharrac fish via Fisher Hai-Luk in Cetus (Earth). Catch Sharrac in the Plains of Eidolon ocean at any time of day using Twilight Bait. Also drops from Thumpers in the Plains of Eidolon.

ExportResources.name: Karkina Antenna
ExportResources.description: Ground into a powder this substance can makes fires burn hotter for a brief amount of time.Source: Cut from Karkina fish via Fisher Hai-Luk in Cetus (Earth). Catch Karkina in the Plains of Eidolon ocean at any time of day using Twilight Bait. Also drops from Thumpers in the Plains of Eidolon.

ExportResources.name: Mawfish Bones
ExportResources.description: The bones of the Mawfish are carved by the Ostron to produce ornaments and tools.Source: Cut from Mawfish via Fisher Hai-Luk in Cetus (Earth). Catch Mawfish in the Plains of Eidolon lake during the Day. Also drops from Thumpers in the Plains of Eidolon.

ExportResources.name: Khut-Khut Venom Sac
ExportResources.description: The poison is used to cure leather and as a reagent to produce an embalming fluid.Source: Cut from Khut-Khut fish via Fisher Hai-Luk in Cetus (Earth). Catch Khut-Khut in Plains of Eidolon ponds during the Day. Also drops from Thumpers in the Plains of Eidolon.

ExportResources.name: Yogwun Stomach
ExportResources.description: Once cleaned and tanned this organ can be turned into a durable leather.Source: Cut from Yogwun fish via Fisher Hai-Luk in Cetus (Earth). Catch Yogwun in Plains of Eidolon ponds during the Day. Also drops from Thumpers in the Plains of Eidolon.

ExportResources.name: Tralok Eyes
ExportResources.description: The Ostron boil these into a jelly which forms a strong adhesive when it dries.Source: Cut from Tralok fish via Fisher Hai-Luk in Cetus (Earth). Catch Tralok in the Plains of Eidolon ocean during the Day. Also drops from Thumpers in the Plains of Eidolon.

ExportResources.name: Mortus Horn
ExportResources.description: The horn of the Mortus Lungfish is ground down into a powder and used by the Ostrons in herbal remedies.Source: Cut from Mortus Lungfish via Fisher Hai-Luk in Cetus (Earth). Catch Mortus Lungfish in Plains of Eidolon ponds at any time of day. Also drops from Thumpers in the Plains of Eidolon.

ExportResources.name: Fish Meat
ExportResources.description: Used as a source of food and to create bait for predatory fish.Source: Cut from all Plains of Eidolon Fish via Fisher Hai-Luk in Cetus (Earth).

ExportResources.name: Fish Oil
ExportResources.description: Used to create absolvents that purify gems.Source: Cut from all Plains of Eidolon Fish via Fisher Hai-Luk in Cetus (Earth).

ExportResources.name: Fish Scales

ExportResources.name: Seram Beetle Shell
ExportResources.description: This thick shell is used by Ostrons to manufacture tools and weapons.Source: Cut from Glappid fish via Fisher Hai-Luk in Cetus (Earth). Catch Glappid in the Plains of Eidolon ocean at Night using Glappid Bait. Also drops from Thumper Bulls in the Plains of Eidolon.

ExportResources.name: Norg Brain
ExportResources.description: An Ostron delicacy.Source: Cut from Norg fish via Fisher Hai-Luk in Cetus (Earth). Catch Norg in the Plains of Eidolon lake at Night using Norg Bait. Also drops from Thumpers in the Plains of Eidolon.

ExportResources.name: Cuthol Tendrils
ExportResources.description: Ostrons extract the toxin and apply it to their weapons when hunting animals.Source: Cut from Cuthol fish via Fisher Hai-Luk in Cetus (Earth). Catch Cuthol in Plains of Eidolon pond hotspots at Night. Also drops from Thumpers in the Plains of Eidolon.

ExportResources.name: Cryptographic Alu
ExportResources.description: Excess circuitry disposed of during the Razorback manufacturing process, these components only appear in the vicinity of high level outer-orbit Corpus facilities after a Razorback Armada has been launched.Location: Corpus Archwing units on Jupiter and Neptune when a Razorback Armada is active

ExportResources.name: Riven Sliver
ExportResources.description: A fragment of a sundered Riven. It is known that, with enough slivers, Palladino is capable of reforging a complete Riven. Find her in the Iron Wake (Earth) after completing The Chains of Harrow quest.Location: Eximus units and Requiem Relics

ExportResources.name: Veiled Riven Cipher
ExportResources.description: Use this cipher to instantly complete one Veiled Riven Challenge at the cost of consuming the cipher.

ExportResources.name: Rubedo
ExportResources.description: A jagged crystalline ore. Gives off radiant energy.Location: Earth, Lua, Phobos, Europa, Pluto, Sedna, and the Void

ExportResources.description: Raw Orokin memory plasma. Varzia's Foundry can consume Aya to create Void Relics. Find her in Maroo's Bazaar on Mars.Location: Void Missions and Bounties

ExportResources.name: Anomaly Shard
ExportResources.description: A shard ripped from a Sentient Anomaly in the Veil Proxima. Little Duck is known to trade these for other exotic goods somewhere in Fortuna on Venus.Location: Murex ships found in Veil Proxima nodes marked with a special flashing icon (Railjack)

ExportResources.name: Fate Pearl
ExportResources.description: Retrieved from the shores of a sacred fate dream.Location: Saya's Visions on Earth

ExportResources.name: Sunpoint Plasma Drill Range Widget
ExportResources.description: Increases plasma beam range.

ExportResources.name: Sunpoint Plasma Drill Silencer Widget
ExportResources.description: Mine in peace and avoid alerting nearby enemies with this drill silencing widget.

ExportResources.name: Spectral Debris
ExportResources.description: Discharged specter particles form an inert dust that can be collected and re-energized for various robotic projects.Location: Errant Specters in the Granum Void (Corpus Ship Tileset)

ExportResources.name: Stable Corruptor
ExportResources.description: Injected into a Fomorian Reactor this corruptor will imbalance the fuels. Critically imbalanced reactors will eventually implode, destroy the ship. Slow but effective, recommended for Solo Tenno.

ExportResources.name: Steel Essence
ExportResources.description: Tokens of Teshin's Esteem earned from Incursion Alerts or Acolytes on The Steel Path. Can be exchanged for items that prove your warrior capabilities by visiting Teshin in any Relay.

ExportResources.name: Steel Essence
ExportResources.description: Tokens of Teshin's Esteem earned from Incursion Alerts or Acolytes on The Steel Path. Can be exchanged for items that prove your warrior capabilities by visiting Teshin in any Relay.

ExportResources.description: A component of the Antiserum Injector.Location: Oestrus on Eris

ExportResources.name: Tellurium
ExportResources.description: This rare metal is foreign to the Origin System and can only be found in asteroids that have made the long journey from other stars.Location: Archwing Missions on Uranus

ExportResources.name: Echoes Of Umbra
ExportResources.description: Injecting this fluid into a Warframe will imbue it with the ability to fight autonomously alongside the Operator. Injection requires the use of the Helminth Infirmary, and the ability wears off after 24 hours.

ExportResources.description: Fuses with a Warframe to unlock the Exilus Mod Slot.

ExportResources.name: Sunlight Threshcone
ExportResources.description: This common plant can only be found during the day. Location: Obtained by using a Codex Scanner on Sunlight Threshcone plants that grow on Earth

ExportResources.name: Moonlight Threshcone
ExportResources.description: This common plant can only be found at night. Location: Obtained by using a Codex Scanner on Moonlight Threshcone plants that grow on Earth

ExportResources.name: Ruk's Claw
ExportResources.description: This plant was introduced to arid regions across the Origin System, for its ability to collect moisture in harsh environments. Location: Obtained by using a Codex Scanner on Ruk's Claw plants that grow on Mars

ExportResources.name: Skateweed Extract
ExportResources.description: Extracted from Skateweed.

ExportResources.name: Vestan Moss
ExportResources.description: One of the few known plant species able to thrive on asteroids in deep space. Location: Obtained by using a Codex Scanner on Vestan Moss plants that grow on Mercury, Saturn, and Sedna

ExportResources.name: Cerulean Fungus Extract
ExportResources.description: Extracted from a Cerulean Fungus colony.

ExportResources.name: Ghost Brush Extract
ExportResources.description: Extracted from a Ghost Brush.

ExportResources.name: Sunlight Jadeleaf
ExportResources.description: This rare plant can only be found during the day. Location: Obtained by using a Codex Scanner on Sunlight Jadeleaf plants that grow on Earth

ExportResources.name: Moonlight Jadeleaf
ExportResources.description: This rare plant can only be found at night. Location: Obtained by using a Codex Scanner on Moonlight Jadeleaf plants that grow on Earth

ExportResources.name: Sunlight Dragonlily
ExportResources.description: This uncommon plant can only be found during the day. Location: Obtained by using a Codex Scanner on Sunlight Dragonlily plants that grow on Earth

ExportResources.name: Moonlight Dragonlily
ExportResources.description: This uncommon plant can only be found at night. Location: Obtained by using a Codex Scanner on Moonlight Dragonlily plants that grow on Earth

ExportResources.name: Frostleaf
ExportResources.description: This resilient plant provides a natural food source in frigid areas of the Origin system. Location: Obtained by using a Codex Scanner on Frostleaf plants that grow on Venus, Neptune, and Pluto

ExportResources.name: Dusklight Sarracenia
ExportResources.description: This robust, carnivorous plant has adapted to conditions in polluted waters. Location: Obtained by using a Codex Scanner on Dusklight Sarracenia plants growing in Grineer Shipyards found commonly on Ceres

ExportResources.name: Lunar Pitcher
ExportResources.description: This carnivorous plant can be found growing in the wilderness on Lua. Location: Obtained by using a Codex Scanner on Lunar Pitcher plants that grow on Lua

ExportResources.name: Asterite
ExportResources.description: Formed over billions of years, these crystals are most often found embedded in space rock.Location: Railjack Missions

ExportResources.name: Aucrux Capacitors
ExportResources.description: Once installed, these delicate power systems fuse with a Corpus Obelisk's engines. Unused capacitors are therefore, highly prized.Location: Railjack missions in Venus, Neptune, and Pluto Proximas

ExportResources.name: Bracoid
ExportResources.description: A rare bacterial entity that increases the spread of Infestation found on Infested Ships.

ExportResources.name: Carbides
ExportResources.description: Resilient components used to reinforce the plated sheets of metal strapped to Grineer Ships.Location: Eximus units in the Grineer Shipyard Tileset, and Railjack missions in Earth, Saturn, and Veil Proximas

ExportResources.name: Copernics
ExportResources.description: A cell of encapsulated Void energy.Location: Lua

ExportResources.name: Cubic Diodes
ExportResources.description: Vital components used in the creation of Corpus photon-networks.Location: Eximus units in the Corpus Ice Planet Tileset, and Railjack missions in Venus, Neptune, and Pluto Proximas

ExportResources.name: Fresnels
ExportResources.description: A rare Orokin material used to create a tear in space and allow safe passage through the Void.

ExportResources.name: Gallos Rods
ExportResources.description: Antimatter fuel cell that powers the Grineer Ships.Location: Railjack missions in Earth, Saturn, and Veil Proximas

ExportResources.name: Isos
ExportResources.description: A self-replicating fluid comprised of nanoproxies capable of independently repairing worn and damaged systems.Location: Railjack missions in Venus, Neptune, and Pluto Proximas

ExportResources.name: Kesslers
ExportResources.description: Orokin devices used for navigating the solar winds.

ExportResources.name: Komms
ExportResources.description: A component used in secure Grineer communication networks.Location: Railjack missions in Earth, Saturn, and Veil Proximas

ExportResources.name: Nullstones
ExportResources.description: Nullstones do not conform to several laws of physics, making them highly prized for optimizing sensitive components.Location: Railjack Missions

ExportResources.name: Pustrels
ExportResources.description: A parasitic growth that often infects Eximus units operating in Infested environs.Location: Eris

ExportResources.name: Ticor Plate
ExportResources.description: High-density alloy armor plating used in the construction of offensive spacecraft.Location: Railjack Missions

ExportResources.name: Titanium
ExportResources.description: This highly malleable metal was exploited in great quantities by the Orokin and can now only be found within space rock.Location: Railjack Missions

ExportResources.name: Trachons
ExportResources.description: An organ found on Infested Ships believed to facilitate communication within the Infested Hivemind.

ExportResources.name: Relay Strut Component
ExportResources.description: An integral building block in the construction of Tenno relays.

ExportResources.name: Pyrus Essence
ExportResources.description: With a blazing orange hue and rigid material strength, this compound is prized by ship and station architects.

ExportResources.name: Trembera Essence
ExportResources.description: A highly purified mineral compound prized for its strength, resiliency, and resistance to heat. Widely used in the construction of Tenno relays.

ExportResources.name: Mutagen Mass
ExportResources.description: This living mass can produce weaponized toxins for weaponry.Location: Clan Research (Bio Lab in the Dojo) and Infested Outbreak Invasion Rewards

ExportResources.name: Mutagen Sample
ExportResources.description: These samples could advance our knowledge of biological research.Location: Eris and Deimos

ExportResources.name: Detonite Injector
ExportResources.description: Detonite injectors are the basis for explosive and incendiary weapons.Location: Clan Research (Chem Lab in the Dojo) and Grineer Invasion Rewards

ExportResources.name: Detonite Ampule
ExportResources.description: Researching the Detonite traces within could advance our weapon technology.Location: Venus, Earth, Lua, Ceres, Saturn, Sedna, and the Kuva Fortress

ExportResources.name: Corpus Cipher
ExportResources.description: A cipher used to decode Corpus intel. Crafting component required to create a CORPUS VOID KEY

ExportResources.name: Corpus Datamass
ExportResources.description: A Corpus datamass containing encrypted intel. Crafting component required to create a CORPUS VOID KEY

ExportResources.name: Fieldron
ExportResources.description: ClanTech weaponized containment field to contain superheated substances.Location: Clan Research (Energy Lab in the Dojo) and Corpus Invasion Rewards

ExportResources.name: Fieldron Sample
ExportResources.description: This destroyed Fieldron could further research into super-heated containment fields.Location: Venus, Mars, Jupiter, Europa, Neptune, and Pluto

ExportResources.description: This delicate Entrati design’s slender metal arm holds a subtle blue flame in a state of perfect equipoise.

ExportResources.description: Natural infested forms combine in an eye-catching piece that recalls the singular landscape of Deimos.

ExportResources.description: Sneak in this stand-out accent piece to give your ship’s interior a unique flair.

ExportResources.name: Spilosect

ExportResources.description: Beauty and strangeness blend in this distinctive tendrilled houseplant.

ExportResources.name: Veforg
ExportResources.description: This bioluminescent plant is sure to brighten up any dark corner in your Orbiter.

ExportResources.name: Ansophys
ExportResources.description: The functional elegance of Orokin design makes this a versatile piece for storage or display.

ExportResources.name: Kybus
ExportResources.description: Evoking the timeless classicism of the Orokin era, the Kybus makes a great base or table.

ExportResources.name: Auroron
ExportResources.description: With its antiqued metal and delicate gold accents, this Orokin floor piece adds grace and style to any room.

ExportResources.name: Duviri Hand Spa
ExportResources.description: Duviri citizens are expected to keep clean at all times, in case Thrax’s gaze should fall upon them.

ExportResources.name: Duviri Mortis Stela
ExportResources.description: A replica of the cryptic monument that overshadows the many graves of Duviri.

ExportResources.name: Duviri Theater Seat
ExportResources.description: Ideal for appreciating Bombastine’s performances. Cushioned to avoid uncomfortable posterior numbness.

ExportResources.name: Duviri Senate Seat
ExportResources.description: The style of chair that would be occupied by Duviri’s elected government, if it had one.

ExportResources.name: Duviri Hay Bale
ExportResources.description: Standard fodder for the Kaithes of Duviri, doubling as a humble bed for the weary laborer.

ExportResources.name: Duviri Footstool
ExportResources.description: Even the lowest Duviri citizen may need to reach a high spot from time to time.

ExportResources.name: Duviri Repast Table
ExportResources.description: A sturdy table on which to enjoy the nutritious dole of simple grains which Thrax’s generosity has blessed you with.

ExportResources.name: Duviri Lectern
ExportResources.description: Ideal for lecturing, preaching, or reading magnificent poetic compositions to a crowd who does not understand or appreciate them.

ExportResources.name: Duviri Scales
ExportResources.description: Used to weigh out meager, everyday goods by meager, everyday merchants.

ExportResources.name: Duviri Fainting Couch
ExportResources.description: For those times when turning into an Orowyrm is not an option.

ExportResources.name: Duviri Modesty Screen

ExportResources.name: Duviri Clerical Desk
ExportResources.description: Draft and redraft endless bureaucratic scrolls with this fine Duviri desk.

ExportResources.description: A hero on the back of a loyal Kaithe, as described in the storybook, Tales of Duviri.

ExportResources.description: A watchful eye for the Orbiter.

ExportResources.name: Localized Air Purifier Decoration

ExportResources.name: Solaris Motherwrench Decoration

ExportResources.name: Solaris Diagnostic Tool Decoration
ExportResources.description: Useful for taking atmospheric readings and measuring the thermal properties of coolant. A handy addition to any lander.

ExportResources.name: Solaris Sampler Decoration

ExportResources.name: Solaris Toolbox Decoration
ExportResources.description: For when you really need that thermal prong within manipulator's reach. A handy addition to any lander.

ExportResources.name: Solaris Supplies Decoration

ExportResources.name: Gallixware Raku Vase
ExportResources.description: The grooves in this vase were shaped by the careful hands of artist Bren Terrasiam.

ExportResources.name: Gallixware Kaolin Bowl
ExportResources.description: The flowing pattern Bren Terrasiam painted onto this bowl is meant to promote serenity.

ExportResources.name: Gallixware Bisque Amphora
ExportResources.description: Bren Terrasiam fashioned custom amphorae for elite Orokin who stored and served fine wine with style.

ExportResources.name: Gallixware Coiled Vase
ExportResources.description: Bren Terrasiam lovingly fashioned and stacked clay coils to form this vase.

ExportResources.name: Gallixware Studded Vase
ExportResources.description: Bren Terrasiam was renowned for his precision. The uniformity of this vase was typical in his fine ceramics.

ExportResources.name: Gallixware Frit Plate
ExportResources.description: Orokin ceramic artist, Bren Terrasiam employed an old world glazing technique to give this plate a lustrous finish. Elites of the day admired his mastery of the ancient arts.

ExportResources.name: Noggle Statue - Xaku Prime
ExportResources.description: A small wobbly statue of Xaku Prime.

ExportResources.name: Waverider's Heart Decoration

ExportResources.name: Arsenal Segment
ExportResources.description: Install this segment in order to enable the Arsenal within your orbiter.

ExportResources.name: MELEE UPGRADE SEGMENT
ExportResources.description: Strengthen your Arsenal with Melee Arcanes. This segment unlocks Exilus Slots for your Melee Weapons.

ExportResources.name: Archwing Launcher Segment
ExportResources.description: Adds the Archwing Launcher to the foundry.

ExportResources.name: AUXILIARY FORMA CRUCIBLE
ExportResources.description: A foundry upgrade that allows two Forma to be crafted at the same time.

ExportResources.name: Landing Craft Foundry Segment
ExportResources.description: Upgrades the Orbiter's Foundry with the following features:- Allows construction of Landing Craft- Allows construction of Air Support ChargesEquip Air Support Charges in your Loadout's Gear.

ExportResources.name: Kavat Incubator Upgrade Segment
ExportResources.description: Allows the Incubator to breed Kavats.

ExportResources.name: Incubator Segment
ExportResources.description: Install this segment to enable the pet incubator within your Orbiter.

ExportResources.name: Nutrio Incubator Upgrade Segment
ExportResources.description: Upgrades the Orbiter's Incubator with the following features:- Regress genetic aging of mature companions- Egg incubation reduced by a day

ExportResources.name: HELMINTH ARCHON SHARD SEGMENT
ExportResources.description: Allows the Helminth to socket Archon Shards in the current Warframe. Archon Shards permanently enhance various stats.

ExportResources.name: HELMINTH COALESCENT SEGMENT
ExportResources.description: Allows the Helminth to fuse Archon Shards into more powerful variants through Coalescent Fusion and Ascent Fusion.

ExportResources.name: HELMINTH SEGMENT
ExportResources.description: Empower the Helminth in your Orbiter and unlock the transfer of new abilities to your Warframes.

ExportResources.name: HELMINTH INVIGORATION SEGMENT
ExportResources.description: Allows The Helminth to inject a Warframe with an Invigoration. Invigorations temporarily increase a Warframe's capabilities.

ExportResources.name: Mod Fusion Segment
ExportResources.description: Install this segment to enable the Mod Fusion function within the MODS terminal of your Orbiter.

ExportResources.name: Railjack Cephalon
ExportResources.description: A Railjack Command Cephalon. Responsible for ships systems, mission completion and crew preservation.

ExportResources.name: RELIQUARY KEY
ExportResources.description: Resembling a Void Key, this object appears to be a perfect match for the empty slot in the Railjack's reliquary.

ExportResources.name: Scimitar
ExportResources.description: This blade-like landing craft is armed with Carpet Bomb air-support.

ExportResources.name: Liset
ExportResources.description: The landing craft of choice utilised by the Tenno during their missions.

ExportResources.name: SKAUT
ExportResources.description: A Grineer Bolkor remodeled for Tenno reinforcement. Skaut’s alert signal calls Kahl and his Grineer brothers for backup. When backup is active, use the alert signal to replenish your squad’s health. Each squad member can call one additional Grineer brother to join the fight.Also available in the Market after completing the Veilbreaker quest.

ExportResources.name: Xiphos
ExportResources.description: Featuring Sentry Gun air-support, this stylish landing craft is an asset in any battle.

ExportResources.name: Mantis
ExportResources.description: This insect-like landing craft features Med-Tower air-support.

ExportResources.name: Nightwave
ExportResources.description: A landing craft model that pays homage to the forever-wandering home of pirate DJ Nora Night. Stay deadly, Dreamers. Nightwave's air support releases powerful sound waves, destroying weaker enemies while stunning more powerful ones.

ExportResources.name: Parallax
ExportResources.description: The Parallax was designed for Zariman interplanetary research. It can deploy the advanced Orokin Eye air support, which would have allowed colonizers to study areas rich in rare resources before landing.

ExportResources.name: TRAINING DEBT-BOND
ExportResources.description: The Taxmen call it an investment in our future, but loans to cover vocational and specialist training almost always cost more than you'll ever earn. Especially with the interest.Obtained from Bounties in the Orb Vallis (Venus), or purchased from Ticker in Fortuna (Venus).

ExportResources.name: SHELTER DEBT-BOND
ExportResources.description: Covers everything from hab rent to insurance, docking permits and paying off that rail tractor. Big ticket items.Obtained from Bounties in the Orb Vallis (Venus), or purchased from Ticker in Fortuna (Venus).

ExportResources.name: MEDICAL DEBT-BOND
ExportResources.description: To get work you need mods. Then you need more work to pay for the mods, so you get more mods. And here we are.Obtained from Bounties in the Orb Vallis (Venus), or purchased from Ticker in Fortuna (Venus).

ExportResources.name: ADVANCES DEBT-BOND
ExportResources.description: Sometimes a rig jockey needs a helping hand, so they get an advance on the next pay. Massive interest rates almost guarantee they'll be paying that off forever.Obtained from Bounties in the Orb Vallis (Venus), or purchased from Ticker in Fortuna (Venus).

ExportResources.name: FAMILIAL DEBT-BOND
ExportResources.description: Debts unpaid by one generation are passed to the next. Working to pay them off is seen as something to be proud of. What choice do they have?Obtained from Bounties in the Orb Vallis (Venus), or purchased from Ticker in Fortuna (Venus).
